##### Time - Shannon {.tabset .tabset-dropdown}

###### Means

```{r}
p_isolated_alpha = plot.patches.points(ds_patches, patch_type_input,
                       response_variable) %>%
  print()
```

Let's look at what's happening to the small patches.

```{r}

#Time point 6

ds_patches %>%
  filter(disturbance == disturbance_global_input,
         time_point == 6,
         patch_type == "Small isolated") %>%
  select(all_of(response_variable),
         species_richness)

#Time point 7

ds_patches %>%
  filter(disturbance == disturbance_global_input,
         time_point == 7,
         patch_type == "Small isolated") %>%
  select(all_of(response_variable),
         species_richness)
```
